entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character in the story who is smiling and seems to be guiding Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story who is having a conversation with Dumbledore.

entities.name: king's cross
entities.description: King's Cross is a location where Harry and Dumbledore are currently at.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story who has possession of the Elder Wand.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand is an object that Voldemort possesses.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore are currently at King's Cross.
Dumbledore seems to be opposed to Voldemort, as he wants Harry to go back and possibly defeat him.
Harry is related to the Elder Wand because of his connection to Voldemort's possession of it.
